alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:18PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...LINE OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS PRODUCING GUSTY WINDS AND FREQUENT LIGHTNING ACROSS IDAHO NATIONAL LABORATORY AND MUD LAKE MOVING EAST TOWARD INTERSTATE 15... At 1016 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mud Lake to 13 miles east of Southeast INL to 10 miles southwest of Taber. Movement was east at 10 MPH. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 MPH, half inch hail, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar and weather station indicated. A wind gust to 54 MPH was reported over the eastern INL at 930 PM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Terreton, Roberts, Mud Lake, Hamer, Rockford, Monteview, Taber, Kettle Butte, East Butte and Sage Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If you observe strong winds, hail, or any damage, please report your observations to the National Weather Service in Pocatello via phone, email, or social media.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
